DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate new program design increase condom use woman men .
DOC.brief_title: Increasing Condom Use People Risk HIV Infection
DOC.detailed_description: As heterosexual HIV transmission increase , effective behavioral intervention increase condom use need . Interventions low cost accessible large segment at-risk population . This study evaluate efficacy behavioral intervention design increase condom use at-risk , heterosexually active woman men . The intervention computer-delivered provide health care setting . The study also examine additional psychosocial mediator condom use test predictive efficacy Multifaceted Model HIV Risk . Participants recruit four health clinic site serve local ethnic minority community . The participant randomly assign either individualized intervention design increase condom use HIV information comparison group . All participant receive comparable group-specific informational material study entry Months 2 4 . Participants intervention group receive individualize feedback specially-tailored manual . Participants HIV information comparison group receive general HIV information feedback best-available informational manual . Assessments group conduct study entry Months 6 , 12 , 18 . At study entry , participant complete paper pencil questionnaires last 30 minute . There also computer question session study entry Months 2 4 . Participants ask condom use , contraceptive use , risk behavior , sexual transmit disease ( STD ) history , personal relationship . Telephone follow-ups Months 6 , 12 , 18 take approximately 20 30 minute .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria HIV uninfected Sexually active At risk HIV ( determine study official ) Speaks English Seen participate clinic Exclusion Criteria Pregnant
